## Notes
1. LaTeX learning resource: <https://www.overleaf.com/learn/latex/Learn_LaTeX_in_30_minutes>
2. List of LaTeX symbols: <https://sites.math.washington.edu/~reu/docs/latex_symbols.pdf>

## Exercises
1. Create an account on Overleaf (<https://www.overleaf.com>)
2. Create a LaTeX file with your biography. It should contain the following:
  - sections/subsections
  - numbered/bulleted lists
  - bold/italic text sections
